ext_desc.message: This extension helps you quickly translate any selected text in the web to any languages with Wiktionary.

popup_no_selected_text.message: Let's try selecting a word and reopen this popup.

popup_wiktionary_not_found.message: The text you're finding the meaning was not found in Wiktionary. Redirecting to Google Translate...

popup_error_text_too_long.message: Error: The text you selected is too long.

config_quickButton_desc.message: Quick Button that shows right above your selected text:

config_wiktionary_language_desc.message: Wiktionary Language (2 chars, example: vi, en, ru, ja,...):

config_error_2.message: Two languages can't be the same.
